events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and we will review your profile shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department. The next steps will be communicated soon.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the process. Please expect communication for initial screening.
Your initial screening was successfully completed. The technical interview will be scheduled shortly to assess your skills further.
We have scheduled your technical interview on May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please confirm your availability for this slot.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. The hiring team was impressed with your coding and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 2:00 PM UTC. Please be prepared to discuss your career goals and cultural fit.
The HR interview completed successfully. Your background and values align well with our company culture.
We are pleased to offer you the Software Engineer position. The offer details have been sent to your email for review.
Thank you for accepting the offer. We are excited to have you join our Engineering team. Next steps include the onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome aboard! Please check your portal for onboarding schedules and resources.
The hiring process for this position is now closed with your successful placement. We look forward to your contributions as part of the team.
